comment: сразу у входа в некронскую гробницу

languages.text: По стенам гробницы, украшенным странными геометрическими фигурами, растекается едва уловимый тяжелый гул.
Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.
languages.original_text: По стенам гробницы, украшенным странными геометрическими фигурами, растекается едва уловимый тяжелый гул.

traits.locale_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt adorned with strange geometric shapes.
Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt adorned with strange geometric shapes.
Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.
Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.
Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

languages.text: 墓穴的墙壁装饰着古怪的几何形状，几乎将沉重的敲击声完全隔绝在外。
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

traits.locale_text: 墓穴的墙壁装饰着古怪的几何形状，几乎将沉重的敲击声完全隔绝在外。

languages.text: Die Wände der Krypta, die mit merkwürdigen geometrischen Formen verziert sind, sondern ein kaum wahrnehmbares Brummen ab.
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

traits.locale_text: Die Wände der Krypta, die mit merkwürdigen geometrischen Formen verziert sind, sondern ein kaum wahrnehmbares Brummen ab.

languages.text: Les murs de la crypte sont recouverts d'étranges formes géométriques et vibrent au rythme d'un vrombissement sourd à peine perceptible.
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

traits.locale_text: Les murs de la crypte sont recouverts d'étranges formes géométriques et vibrent au rythme d'un vrombissement sourd à peine perceptible.

languages.text: Un tamborileo grave, apenas perceptible, recorre las paredes de la cripta, que están cubiertas de extrañas formas geométricas.
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

traits.locale_text: Un tamborileo grave, apenas perceptible, recorre las paredes de la cripta, que están cubiertas de extrañas formas geométricas.

languages.text: 奇妙な幾何学模様で飾られた地下墓地の壁には、かろうじて感知できる程度の低い音が響いている。
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.

traits.locale_text: 奇妙な幾何学模様で飾られた地下墓地の壁には、かろうじて感知できる程度の低い音が響いている。

languages.text: Mahzenin tuhaf, geometrik şekillerle bezeli duvarlarından zar zor duyulabilen, ağır bir vızıltı yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: Barely perceptible heavy thrumming permeates the walls of the crypt, which are adorned with strange geometric shapes.
